author: amaltaro
body:
Trying to superseed https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4479 , given that cms bot doesn't like that PR...

Summary of changes is:
* update pyopenssl version which has two security vulnerabilities, as reported here:
https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/network/alert/requirements.txt/pyopenssl/closed
* updated build-with-pip to be in sync with the CMSSW branch (rules for py2-* packages installed via pip)
* updated several other specs (mostly python libraries), reusing those from the CMSSW 10_4_X branch when possible, including numpy and scipy. Still a bunch to be updated though....
* fixed dependencies for a couple of python library specs
title: Build/install python packages with pip; upgrade several python specs
